title: Gorgeous Colonial with Rochester Schools
map_address: 3182 Huntsman Blvd near Lapeer and Silverbell
app_fee: $50 per adult applicant for credit and background check
posting_body: ft., 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath, smartly designed and just like new, situated within the desirable Estates at Bald Mountain community with sought after Rochester schools, you are greeted with a well planned layout complete with a first floor office, a formal dining room, nicely spaced great room with tons of natural light and gas fireplace, additional 1st floor room could be used as den or play room, open kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counters, bonus space off kitchen could be used as 2nd office or study area for kids, 1st floor laundry comes with upgraded washer and dryer, all bedrooms have excellent space and are carpeted, master bedroom complete with walk in closet and full bath, full basement great for storage and rec area, stamped concrete patio, 3 car attached garage with electric car charge port, irrigation, central air and to top it off access to the community pool, playground and clubhouse.
1.5 month security deposit, $350 non refundable cleaning fee.
1 small dog may be negotiable with fee.
